attributes.action: disestablish the Church of England forthwith
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown has praised the Archbishop of Canterbury as a man of "great integrity" following criticism of his remarks on Muslim Sharia law. 

The archbishop is expected to speak on the subject at the general synod later.

A modern secular society has no role for  any church wishing to influence the laws of the country, and bishops should not be part of the legislature of the United Kingdom

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
